Interactive District Map
========================

Citywide Mayor and At-Large positions are shown below. Click on a La Porte City Council District on the map below to find district representation. (For a full-screen version of the map,

To email the entire Council as a group, use LPCityCouncil@LaPorteTX.gov. For individual Councilmembers, visit our
[Mayor & Council webpage](https://www.laportetx.gov/153/Mayor-Council)
.
